com.groupA.location.world

Class LocationManagerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.groupA.location.world.LocationManagerFragment

  • public class LocationManagerFragment
extends Fragment
    Deals with contacts with Google Location Services

      • onAttach

        public void onAttach(Activity activity)
        This gets called when the class is instantiated. It checks that the main activity implements the interface LocationManagerListener; and if so, it stores that implementation in mListener (to be able to invoke it if necessary). Otherwise, it raises an exception.
